Archer.desc:
Click Combo: LEFT-RIGHT-RIGHT
Shoots a long-ranged arrow that explodes and deals high damage over a large area. (Self-damage for 10% of your DPS)
Mana Cost: 45
Total Damage: 160% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: 140%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Range: ±26 Blocks
Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a bow. </br> Main Attack Damage: +5% </br>Main Attack Range: +6 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb. </br> Mana Cost: -10

Hitting a mob directly with Arrow Bomb, will shatter its heart and deal additional damage.

Total Damage: +100% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: +100%)
Doubles Main Attack arrows and reduces their damage. (Harder to hit distant enemies) </br> Main Attack Damage: -40% (per arrow)
Click Combo: LEFT-LEFT-LEFT </br> Throw yourself backward to avoid danger. (Hold shift while escaping to cancel) </br> Mana Cost: 20
Your Main Attack arrows have increased speed and knockback.

Click Combo: LEFT-RIGHT-LEFT
Shoots a stream of 8 arrows, dealing significant damage to close mobs and pushing them away.
Mana Cost: 35
Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Neutral: 30%)
 (Thunder: 10%)
Range: ±16 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Escape by 5.

Click Combo: LEFT-LEFT-RIGHT
Forms a shield around you that slightly reduces the damage you take. Being hit will consume one charge of the shield. Enemies that get too close will take damage and be knocked away. (3 charges)
Mana Cost: 30
Total Damage: 70% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: 60%)
 (Air: 10%)
Effect: 20% Resistance Bonus
Area of Effect: 2.3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 60s
Casting Escape grants a speed buff to you and nearby players. </br> </br>Effect: +40% Walk Speed to Allies </br>Duration: 120s </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks. </br> </br>Air Damage: +3-4 </br>Air Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks. </br> </br>Thunder Damage: +1-8 </br>Thunder Damage: +10%
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks. </br> </br>Fire Damage: +3-5 </br>Fire Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Water attacks. </br> </br>Water Damage: +2-4 </br>Water Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks. </br> </br>Earth Damage: +2-4 </br>Earth Damage: +20%

Doubles the speed of Arrow Storm and shoots +6 arrows per stream.

Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Neutral: -5%)
 (Thunder: -5%)

When Arrow Shield loses its last charge, spew 150 arrows around you to rain down on enemies.

Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Neutral: 150%)
 (Air: 100%)

Hitting an enemy with Arrow Storm will create an area of effect that slows them down and deals damage every 0.4s.

 (Earth: 10%)
Effect: 40% Slowness to Enemies
Duration: 5s

 (Neutral: 30%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Duration: 6s
Cooldown: 3s

Total Damage: 30% (of your DPS, per hit)

 (Water: 5%)
Range: 16 Blocks
Duration: 1.2s
Triples Main Attack arrows but they deal -10% of normal Main Attack arrow damage. </br> Main Attack Damage: -10%
Hitting an enemy will give you a brief buff of +3% Walk Speed. (Max +70%) -10% of the bonus decays every second.

Your Arrow Shield arrows turn into sentient bows that attack nearby enemies up to 8 times each. Arrow Shield loses -1 charge. (Arrow Shield will no longer knock enemies away or provide resistance)

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Neutral: 30%)
 (Air: 10%)

Arrow Storm will shoot +1 stream of arrows and +2 extra arrows per stream.
Arrow Storm gains recoil while midair.

Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Neutral: -9%)
 (Thunder: -3%)
 (Air: +2%)
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm by 5.

Arrow Bomb pulls enemies towards you. If a Trap is nearby, it will pull them towards it instead. Increases Heart Shatter's damage.

For every 1% Walk Speed you have from items, gain +1 Raw Spell Damage (Max 100)

While wearing the Mask of the Fanatic, your Totem will shatter upon impacting the ground, rapidly triggering 8s worth of its effects. </br> Regeneration will only heal 50% of its usual amount.
Masquerade will trigger after -1 less Mask switch. Reduces mana  bonus by -10.

Totem will summon an Effigy that will attack enemies and push them towards the nearest Totem. The Effigy will live for as long as its Totem does.
Each Totem will summon its own Effigy. Each additional Effigy summoned will decrease all Effigy damage by 0.8x.

Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: 75%)
 (Fire: 25%)

When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Heretic. (Shift + Uproot to remove it) </br> While wearing this Mask, the mana cost of Haul is reduced and you gain walk speed at the cost of reduced damage. </br> Mana Cost: -50% </br>Effects: +80% Walk Speed to Self    -10% Damage Bonus to Self

Casting Totem while holding shift will spend 30 points of Blood Pool (per Totem) to set all Totem durations to 10s, fabricating 4 nightmarish tentacles that each deal heavy damage to a separate enemy near your Totem, prioritizing high health targets.
All enemies within range will be crippled, gaining debuffs and taking x2 Bleeding damage ticks for the duration.
While this ability is active, Blood Connection becomes an unrestricted, short-range teleport, and Totem cannot be cast.

Total Damage: 840% (of your DPS, per strike)
 (Neutral: 640%)
 (Thunder: 100%)
 (Fire: 100%)
Area of Effect: 24 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Effects: +40% Slowness to Enemies -20% Resistance Bonus to Enemies
Increases Aura's healing by +0.3% for every 1% </br>Water Damage Bonus you have from items. (Max +75%)
Increase your maximum Blood Pool by +30 points. Increase your maximum Bleeding duration by +1.5s.
Uproot will slow down enemies. </br> </br>Effect: 40% Slowness to Enemies </br>Duration: 3s

When switching to the Mask of the Heretic, you and your allies are given a speed boost. -15% of the bonus decays every second. </br> </br>Effect: +60% Walk Speed to Allies </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 8s

Increase Bleeding damage.

Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: +20%)
When any player takes damage within your Totem's range, 35% of the damage taken proportional to your maximum health is added to your Blood Pool. (Max 10 points per hit)

Greatly reduce Main Attack spread.
Your Main Attack will now inflict enemies with Bleeding for +0.25s per beam.
Bleeding enemies take damage every 0.5s. Bleeding damage dealt within Totem's range also adds +0.4 points to your Blood Pool.

Total Damage: 30% (of your DPS, from Bleeding)
 (Neutral: 30%)
Hitting your Puppets with Main Attack will cause them to lose 2s of their duration per beam.

When switching to the Mask of the Fanatic, you and your allies are given a temporary resistance buff. </br> </br>Effect: 70% Resistance Bonus to Allies </br>Duration: 2s </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 8s

Increase Twisted Tether's damage.

Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: +20%)
Increase your maximum Totems by +1. Totem and Aura will do 50% less damage. </br> Regeneration and Sacrificial Shrine will heal 50% less health.
Aura will temporarily increase your Summons' attack speed. Players hit will gain +3 mana. </br> </br>Effect: +30% Attack Speed to Summons </br>Duration: 2.5s

properties.TODO: Make this not multiply base damage...

Shaman.desc: While wearing the Mask of the Heretic, your Totem will move towards you, unless you are within its range.

When wearing the Mask of the Heretic, Haul will instead bounce you off the ground 3 times at an increasing speed and damage nearby enemies.
Frog Dance does not require Totem to be used.

Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: 150%)
 (Water: 50%)
Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

When switching to the Mask of the Lunatic, reduce the defenses of nearby enemies. </br> </br>Effect: -15% Resistance Bonus to Enemies </br>Duration: 3s </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 8s
Increase your maximum Blood Pool by +30 points. Increase your maximum Bleeding duration by +1.5s.
When you or your Summons kill an enemy, gain +1 Max Puppets for 15s. (Max +8)

Casting Aura while holding shift will rally all active Puppets to your side, granting them increased attack speed and accuracy. </br> Your Main Attack deals 3% more damage for each rallied Puppet. </br> While not rallied, your Summons' attacks will build up the duration of this ability by +0.1s per attack. (Max 30s) </br> </br>Effect: +25% Attack Speed to Puppets
Your Hummingbirds' passive effects are improved. </br> </br>Effects: +20% Walk Speed to Self    +2 Jump Height to Self

Summon 2 Hummingbird Carvings which fly around you, passively granting a walk speed buff. Casting Haul while holding shift will temporarily send your Hummingbirds to attack nearby enemes, rapidly piercing through them every 0.25s. Casting it again will call them back early. While they are attacking, your Hummingbirds will not apply their passive effects to you. (Duration: 10s)

After saving 150 mana from your Masks' mana reductions, switching Masks will cause you to become Awakened for 25s, giving you the upsides of all Masks at once with no downsides. </br> Switching to an attached Mask while Awakened will immediately recall the Mask back to you.

Casting Uproot or Haunting Memory while holding shift will spend 70 points of Blood Pool to cast a destructive beam that chains between enemies and allies, and damages enemies every 0.2s.
You and any allies within the beam will receive +2% Overhealth per hit. Bonus health decays over 20s.

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
 (Neutral: 100%)
 (Water: 20%)
Duration: 5s
Range: 24 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Uproot by 5.
